prompt_inputs.profile: Entry-level professional, risk-averse, seeking basic financial stability

solution_criteria: Create a 12-month budget plan that reduces expenses by at least 10%
Develop a realistic savings strategy to meet monthly $500 goal
Provide clear, actionable monthly financial improvement steps
task_description: Write a compact, concise 12 months project plan for enhancing the financial life.
scenario: Test with a user having limited financial literacy seeking basic budgeting guidance

scenario: Test with a high-income professional looking for advanced wealth optimization strategies
